item.title: How to make exp slow down at level100
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

Well, this is not a nooby forums like the runescape ones. You use capitals in your titles, and make sure you spell everything right. In the thread, add an in depth description of what it is about, containing the main idea, and the details.Just because the title says it, you need to restate it. The little things matterâ€¦ If your thread was neat and organised, you would get help much faster. Once again, try harder,

~ThatOneServer
